document.full_text: inflation in the euro zone climbed higher than expected in march to 2.7 percent year-on-year, statistics published on friday showed, adding to the case for further rises in interest rates.
document.title: euro zone inflation jumps as rate hikes loom
lines_and_colors: inflation in the euro zone climbed higher than expected in march to 2.7 percent year-on-year, statistics published on friday showed, adding to the case for further rises in interest rates.
